The microcytotoxicity index is EC50 value (in ppm).
contain the live body antibacterial action of the antimicrobial soap of 1.5% and 0.8% trichloro-symmetrical diphenyl urea to two kinds of pathogen bacterial strains.
The diluted measured object of 500 μ l is changed in the test tube that contains reagent accordingly.
